name: ENDV Illumination Addon
short_description:
This version (2.201a) is to replace the previous version uploaded. This fixes some minor issues the were noticed in the console printout also makes 12V Energy lamps available along with the normal LS2 Energy Lamps.
Delete any previous version of this addon from your addons directory before installing this one.
Instructions and information are located in the README.txt file of this addon.

Future versions will include energy conversion devices, spotlights, storage batteries, small generators and solar panels to make this addon more or less not reliant on LS2 or Petrol mod addon

LS2, RD2 are required
Petrol Mod is required for 12V lamps
summary: This adds working lamp SENTS that require RD2
